name: Tapu Fini
description: Although it’s called a guardian deity, terrible calamities sometimes befall those who recklessly approach Tapu Fini.

attacks.name: Smash Turn
attacks.effect: You may switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ocean Loop
attacks.effect: Put an Energy attached to this Pokémon into your hand.
